rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance with minimalistic design accentuating natural lighting and a neutral color palette to set the tone for the Bohemian style.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An open-plan living area featuring eclectic decor, indoor plants, and artistic wall murals that complement the Bohemian theme. Provides a comfortable seating area with natural lighting from large windows.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Integrated within the living space, this area offers a bohemian charm with a reclaimed wood table and vibrant cushions, ensuring ample seating for gatherings.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom/Servant Quarters
rooms.description: A multipurpose room serving as guest accommodation and servant quarters. It includes built-in storage, a compact bathroom with essential fixtures following local building norms.

rooms.name: Service Corridor
rooms.description: A corridor connecting the kitchen to other utility spaces ensuring privacy for household staff while maintaining the overall design flow.

openings.description: Large glass door with wrought iron detailing that enhances security and natural light.
